thread.title: Best City Hotel - Singapore named

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Best City Hotel - Singapore named
text:
Click here for information and nomination Best City Hotel - Singapore named 
SINGAPORE - Meritus Hotels & Resorts' flagship Mandarin Orchard Singapore emerged Best City Hotel - Singapore under the Travel Supplier Awards Category at the recently concluded 26th Annual TTG Travel Awards 2015. 
Organized by TTG Asia, TTG Travel Awards honours the best of the best in Asia-Pacific travel trade, with readers of TTG Asia, TTG India, TTG China, TTGmice, TTGassociations, TTG-BTmice China and TTG Asia voting for their favorite travel and trade organizations. 
This is the third year running that Mandarin Orchard Singapore is being conferred this prestigious accolade, first clinching the title back in 2010 and then again in 2013 and 2014. 
"This win is testament to the staying power of our brand and our continuing connection with our partners and customers in a marketplace where competition is fierce and expectations are ever evolving," said Danny Wong, Hotel Manager, Mandarin Orchard Singapore. "We are most grateful to all that voted for us, and we are mindful that with this award also comes the important responsibility to keep evolving as a brand and positively contributing to the industry." Oct 21, 2015
